titles.title: Roth TSP Act of 2008
To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for a qualified Roth contribution program under the Thrift Savings Plan.

bill.summary: 4/15/2008--Introduced. Roth TSP Act of 2008 - Requires the Executive Director of the Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board to provide for the inclusion in the Thrift Savings Plan of a qualified Roth contribution program (a program under which an employee may elect to make designated Roth contributions in lieu of elective deferrals under the retirement plan).
